Description:
Enable Dynamic Data Exchange protocol (DDE) in all supported editions of Microsoft Word or Excel.

Author: frack113
Sigma Repository: [GitHub](https://github.com/SigmaHQ/sigma)
Name: Enable Microsoft Dynamic Data Exchange
Query: sourcetype like 'windows-%' eql select * from _source_ where (((target_object like '%\excel\security\disableddeserverlaunch' or target_object like '%\excel\security\disableddeserverlookup') and details = 'dword (0x00000000)') or (target_object like '%\word\security\allowdde' and (details = 'dword (0x00000001)' or details = 'dword (0x00000002)')))
